A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: saw the movie in theaters and was not impressed. compared to the other star wars movies and video game plots\, this one was so lackluster and wasn't clever at all. I didn't understand what Rian johnson was going for  in this movie but it was lame. I tend to keep an open mind when watching movies and i had to watch this again on blu ray to confirm if it was as bad as it was in theaters and I regret wasting my time yet again. I'M hoping episode 9 can save my hope for this trilogy because honestly the star wars magic was not in this movie at all though I will praise the visuals.
